title: Turkey Remittances
description: Remittances in Turkey decreased to 14 USD Million in September from 16 USD Million in August of 2022. Remittances in Turkey averaged 153.70 USD Million from 1984 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 574 USD Million in September of 1998 and a record low of 8 USD Million in April of 2020. In Turkey, Remittances refers to net migrantsâ€™ and short-term employee income transfers (personal remittances). This page provides - Turkey Remittances - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey
